snippet: Stock indexes ended mixed on Thursday, but employment data bolstered optimism in the economy. The euro weakened versus the dollar to a 15-month low.
abstract: Stock indexes end mixed, but employment data bolsters optimism in the economy; the euro weakens versus the dollar to a 15-month low.
lead_paragraph: Stock indexes ended mixed on Thursday, but employment data bolstered optimism in the economy. The euro weakened versus the dollar to a 15-month low.

headline.seo: U.S. Shares Rally and Recover, but the Euro Falls Again
headline.main: U.S. Shares Rally and Recover, but the Euro Falls Again
headline.print_headline: U.S. Shares Rally and Recover, but the Euro Falls Again
